WHO SAFE CHILDBIRTH CHECKLIST IMPLEMENTATION GUIDE  58  
GLOSSARY
Optional, context-specific adaptations 
for the Checklist
There are different evidence-based optional adaptations for the Checklist that are specific to 
the context. Some of these include antiretrovirals (ARVs) for areas where the prevalence of 
HIV is high; malaria testing in high-risk areas; and management of preterm births at facilities
